document.ModsDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding
document.docAuthor: Moulin, Nicolas, Decaens, Thibaud & Annoyer, Philippe
document.masterDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:name.mods:affiliation: 82, route de l'ecole, Hameau de Saveaumare, 76680 Monterolier, France.
Centre d'Ecologie Fonctionnelle et Evolutive, UMR 5175, CNRS, Universite de Montpellier, 1919 Route de Mende, 34293 Montpellier Cedex 5, France.
Insectes du Monde Sabine, 09230 Sainte Croix de Volvestre, France.

subSubSection.paragraph: Research required and it is the subject of an upcoming revision.

CAR, Dzanga-Sangha Special Reserve, Bayanga, UV trap 15-20.II.1986 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); between Bayanga and Lidjombo, PK21, UV trap 16.VI.1998 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Lidjombo, in a little bay, UV trap 04.II.2005 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, base camp, UV trap 16.X.2008 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, base camp, night capture 21.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, Sangha river bank, UV trap 25.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, Molongo, trunk, day capture 15.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, base camp, UV trap 24.XI.2010 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM and RCNM); Lake 7, UV trap 28.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 28.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 5, little clearing in the forest, UV trap 29.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Azobe"

, Ochnaceae , UV trap 29.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 29-30.XI.2010 (4♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Azobe"
Lophira alata

Lophira alata
, Ochnaceae , UV trap 12.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-419 and -433, night capture 19.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, Genitalia Moulin NM0057, night capture 22.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 3, UV trap 22.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 27.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 7, barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-418, UV trap 01.III.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM).
Cameroon, CAR, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Gabon, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Liberia.
